translations.chinese: 告高祖，高祖乃心獨喜，自負。
translations.english: They told Emperor Gaozu, who was secretly delighted and grew confident in himself.
His followers grew increasingly fearful of him.

translations.chinese: 秦始皇帝嘗曰「東南有天子氣」，於是東游以猒當之。
translations.english: Qin Shihuang once said: "There is imperial aura in the southeast." So he traveled east to suppress it.

translations.chinese: 高祖隱於芒、碭山澤間，呂后與人俱求，常得之。
translations.english: Emperor Gaozu hid in the mountains and marshes between Mang and Dang. Empress Lü and others searched for him together and always found him.
Emperor Gaozu was surprised and asked how.
